title: Vista, IE7 Banned
excerpt: [digg=http://www.digg.com/microsoft/Vista_IE7_Banned]This is interesting: The U.S. Department of Transportation has banned any upgrades to Microsoft Windows Vista, Internet Explorer 7, and even Office 2007. The DOT’s CIO, Daniel Mintz, says he has placed “an indefinite moratorium” on the upgrades. In the memo he wrote to his staff, he stated the reason as being that “there appears … more →
